**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 99 1.1 **Traditions** [Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2) **Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284) **Duration** 1 minute --- You bind yourself to the power of [Hell](/Planes.aspx?ID=18), transforming into a Medium [devil](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=30) battle form. When you cast this spell, choose barbazu, erinys, osyluth, or sarglagon. If you choose osyluth or sarglagon, the battle form is Large and you must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. While in this form you gain the [devil](/Traits.aspx?ID=44) and [fiend](/Traits.aspx?ID=70) traits. You have hands in this battle form and can use [manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104) actions. You can Dismiss the spell. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of the form that you choose:
  • AC = 22 + your level. Ignore your armor check's penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 5 temporary Hit Points, resistance 5 to physical damage (except [silver](/Equipment.aspx?ID=379)), and weakness 5 to good.
  • Resistance 10 to [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72).
  • [Darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=415).
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you use. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +20, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the [enfeebled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) condition, for example). If your attack modifier is higher for the given unarmed attack or weapon, you can use it instead.
  • [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) modifier of +23, unless your own modifier is higher.
You also gain specific abilities based on the type of devil you choose: - **[Barbazu](/Monsters.aspx?ID=110)** Speed 35 feet; **Melee** glaive ([deadly d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [forceful](/Traits.aspx?ID=180), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 2d8+10 slashing plus 1d6 evil and 1d6 [persistent bleed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29); **Melee** beard, **Damage** 3d8 piercing plus 1d6 evil; **Melee** claw ([agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)), **Damage** 3d6 slashing plus 1d6 evil. - **[Erinys](/Monsters.aspx?ID=111)** Speed 25 feet, fly 40 feet; **Melee** longsword ([versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 1d8+10 slashing plus 1d6 evil and 1d6 fire; **Ranged** composite longbow ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [range increment 100 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [volley](/Traits.aspx?ID=201)), **Damage** 1d8 piercing plus 1d6 evil and 1d6 fire. - **[Osyluth](/Monsters.aspx?ID=608)** Speed 35 feet, fly 30 feet; **Melee** jaws, **Damage** 2d10+10 piercing plus 1d6 evil; **Melee** claw ([agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 10](/Traits.aspx?ID=192) feet), **Damage** 2d6 slashing plus 1d6 evil; **Melee** stinger ([reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 1d10 piercing plus 1d6 evil and 1d6 poison; **Ranged** bone shard ([range increment 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)), **Damage** 2d6 piercing plus 1d6 evil. - **[Sarglagon](/Monsters.aspx?ID=607)** Speed 25 feet, fly 25 feet, swim 30 feet; **Melee** fangs, **Damage** 2d10+10 piercing plus 1d6 evil; **Melee** tentacle arm ([agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)), **Damage** 1d8 bludgeoning plus 1d6 evil and 1d6 poison.
